Title: Meet the Parents
Writer: Greg Glienna, Mary Ruth Clarke, Jim Herzfeld
Actors: Ben Stiller, Robert De Niro, Teri Polo
Plot: Chicago male nurse and chronic under-achiever Greg Focker meets his charming teacher girlfriend Pam Byrnes' parents Jack and Dina before proposing, but suspicious Jack is an overprotective former CIA agent - every date's worst nig...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 7 wins & 15 nominations total
